task.summary: Default task
hopefully this is the commit for the 2.1.0 release for Weapons
fixed server bug. now ready for 2.1.0 release
almost forgot the scythe recipe
alpha 0 for 2.2.0
lots of stuff for next alpha
finished the twilight forest compat. working on adding some fletching table functionality.
finished the twilight forest compat. working on adding some fletching table functionality.
alpha 2 for 2.2.0
fixed issue #6
loads of stuff added enderite plus compat added quiver multi slot functionality
loads of stuff added quiver gui, hud, and arrow swaping
loads of stuff added client Config
completly overhalled how shields where set up.
started on shield recipe stuff
finished shield recipes and models
finished shield recipes and models
started on some more quiver and arrow recipies fixed bug not alowing gauntlents to be enchanted with punch or knockback.
bug fixes.......
added config for arrow damage and bow power.
fixed bugs in fletching recipe system as well as them showing in jei
added config for gauntlet armor and damage attributes.
fixed the shield enchantment glint not apearing when enchanted
1.17.1 renaming dump
fixed arrow entity render and re-added mixin features
changed quiver arrow selection to a player variable instead of rotating the slot contents.
fixed protection percentage reduction being applied to shields not from Vanilla or Expanded Combat.
fix: gold armor not protecting from piglins minor player variable fix
hot fix for server quiver crash due to button checking.
bumped to beta 1
